name: forticasb
label: Fortinet FortiCASB
description: FortiCASB provides policy-based insights into users, behaviors, and data stored in major SaaS applications.

fields.name: server_url
fields.title: Server URL
fields.tooltip: Specify the URL to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.description: Specify the URL of the Lacework server to connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.name: api_key
fields.title: API Key
fields.tooltip: Specify the api key that is configured for your account to access the FortiCASB endpoint.
fields.description: Specify the api key configured for your account to access the FortiCASB endpoint.

fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is selected, i.e., set to true.

operations.title: Get Resource URL Map
operations.description: Retrieves details the current user and business unit.

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.title: StartTime
parameters.tooltip: By default, the value is 24 hours before the current time. Difference between start time and end time should not be greater than 1 Year.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the start time for search. Supported time formats: yyyy-MM-dd, yyyy-MM-ddTHH, yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ, yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.SSSZ. By default, the value is 24 hours before the current time. NOTE: Difference between start time and end time should not be greater than 1 Year.

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.title: EndTime
parameters.tooltip: By default, the value is current time. Difference between start time and end time should not be greater than 1 Year.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the end time for search. Supported time formats: yyyy-MM-dd, yyyy-MM-ddTHH, yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ, yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.SSSZ. By default, the value is current time. NOTE: Difference between start time and end time should not be greater than 1 Year.

parameters.name: service
parameters.title: Service
parameters.description: Cloud service name such as AWSS3, Salesforce,Office365, etc.

parameters.name: user
parameters.title: User
parameters.description: Filter to search user email using a comma separated list.

parameters.name: policy
parameters.title: Policy
parameters.description: Filter to search alert id using a comma separated list.

parameters.name: activity
parameters.title: Activity
parameters.description: Filter to search alert by activities using a comma separated list.

parameters.name: objectidlist
parameters.title: ObjectidList
parameters.description: Filter to search alert by object identity using a comma separated list.

parameters.name: objectname
parameters.title: ObjectName
parameters.description: Filter to search alert by object name

parameters.name: severity
parameters.title: Severity
parameters.description: Filter to search alert by severity using a comma separated list.

parameters.name: status
parameters.title: Status
parameters.description: Filter to search by status using a comma separated list.

parameters.name: idlist
parameters.title: IdList
parameters.description: Filter to search alert by alert IDs using a comma separated list.

parameters.name: alerttype
parameters.title: AlertType
parameters.description: Filter to search alert by alert types using a comma separated list.

parameters.name: countrylist
parameters.title: CountryList
parameters.description: Filter to search alert by countries using a comma separated list.

parameters.name: businessunitname
parameters.title: BusinessUnitName
parameters.description: Filter to search alert by business unit name.

operations.title: Get File Summary
operations.description: Retrieve the details of a file.

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.title: StartTime
parameters.tooltip: By default, the value is 24 hours before the current time. Difference between start time and end time should not be greater than 1 Year.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the start time for search. Supported time formats: yyyy-MM-dd, yyyy-MM-ddTHH, yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ, yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.SSSZ. By default, the value is 24 hours before the current time. NOTE: Difference between start time and end time should not be greater than 1 Year.

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.title: EndTime
parameters.tooltip: By default, the value is current time. Difference between start time and end time should not be greater than 1 Year.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the end time for search. Supported time formats: yyyy-MM-dd, yyyy-MM-ddTHH, yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ, yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.SSSZ. By default, the value is current time. NOTE: Difference between start time and end time should not be greater than 1 Year.

parameters.name: service
parameters.title: Service
parameters.description: Cloud service name such as AWSS3, Salesforce,Office365, etc.

parameters.name: cityList
parameters.title: CityList
parameters.description: Filter to search by city using a comma separated list.

parameters.name: idList
parameters.title: idList
parameters.description: Filter to search by activity id using a comma separated list.

parameters.name: activity
parameters.title: Activity
parameters.description: Filter to search by activity type using a comma separated list (i.e. Upload File, Delete File, Restore File, Download File, Share File, Copy File, Add Folder).

parameters.name: ipList
parameters.title: ipList
parameters.description: Filter to search by IP address using a comma separated list.

parameters.name: objectname
parameters.title: ObjectName
parameters.description: Filter to search by object name
